greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A292383(A122111(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
program: \\ Uses also code given in A336124:
A253553(n) = if(n<=2,1,my(f=factor(n), k=#f~); if(f[k,2]>1,f[k,2]--,f[k,1] = precprime(f[k,1]-1)); factorback(f));
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 14 2020
